title: Refrigerator Bin Button - Blue

installationInstructions.author: Karl from Goochland, VA
installationInstructions.title: Button broke
installationInstructions.content: Remove ice bin,dump out ice (you could save ice in large pan) with the bin inverted remove 2 hex head screws install new button replace the 2 screws.
